::Lord Jhiaxus::

Jhiaxus: I would never presume you weak by any means. I also enjoy the irony of the name.

xochitla2006 <xochitla2006@...> wrote:                                  Perceptor:
 
 "Dont worry, always all decepticons and preds made me same question 
 and answer is a. I enjoys ironies and b. fit with me... If you havent 
 noticed I'm almost blind, I barely can see light than shadow so I 
 percive around thanks ground and ground is my best shield... I can 
 heard every single movement that you do... DOnt think that that I'm 
 weak due my blidness, this have made me stronger beyond you can 
 imagine  "
 
 --- In nbwrpg@yahoogroups.com, Richard Allen <roborick007@...> wrote:
 >
